page.title: 06Recreation Facilities
page.content:
There are three parks in our area. They are {Victoria Park, Wavertree {Playground}and{Wavertree Cricket Club. {Wavertree Playground}is on{Wellington {Road}and has an {Astro Turf}pitch for football, a {Sports Centre & swimmming {pool,}a climbing frame and swings, a running track and some paths to walk along.{ { {Victoria Park}is on {Long Lane}and is good for football. It is our school's home ground.
The {Wavertree Cricket Club }is on the corner of {Sandown Lane.}It is used for playing cricket and there is a bar there and it is a fully licensed club. {
